modName: Liliths Eye of Chaos - Custom Shield
summary: This mod adds a heavy shield and its variations into the game which are balanced for endgame.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]dQNWY3cr53o[/youtube][youtube]jYGchXkBmlk[/youtube][size=6][b][youtube]Rc_3ZdRPIck[/youtube]
Description:[/b][/size]

This mod adds a heavy shield and its variations into the game which are balanced for endgame.

Since this mod was made with different tools than before it differs quite a lot from the older mods in the Lilith's tools series.

[size=5][b]Variations:[/b][/size]

Like most of the mods in the series the shield can be upgraded into its awakened version which has darker textures and a gem in the middle.
In addition to this the mod has 2 base versions for the shield.

Liliths Eye of Chaos: The basic version. It's seriously a big one.

Liliths Eye of Chaos (m): A medium sized version which is thinner and smaller. I recommend this one unless you want the big one.

[size=5]Stats:[/size]

The shield is 2 points above daedric shield raising its defence to 38. Upgrading the shield to its awakened version the defence gets a 1 point buff.
The shields are classified as "heavy armor".

[size=5]Crafting:
[/size]
Crafting the shield requires Daedric smithing and 2 void salts, 4 daedra hearts and 6 ebony ingots and it can be crafted at any forge. Awakened version can be crafted at the same forge as well requiring the base shield, 5 daedra hearts and 2 void salts.

[size=5]Console:[/size]

1: type help[b][size=4] chaos[/size][/b] into the console (basically shows all the entries that have "chaos" in them)

2: it gives you the IDs.

3. type "player.additem *id* *amount* " without the * and "

example: [size=4][b]player.additem 0a000b52 1[/b][/size]

[size=5][b]Installation:[/b][/size]

1. Dump the bsa-file and the esp-file inside the data folder into the skyrim's data folder. / or use the mod manager. it should work.

2. check the .esp file and you're ready to go

[size=5]Uninstallation:[/size]


Just remove the files you added. Â
